channel.title: Many issues i need help with
channel.description:
1.knife glitch- everytime i wont to use throwing knifes, it just sais Throwing knifes are disabled for now. And not sure how to get them to work. 3.food glitch- ive changed the food to heal regular but it still heals the same as before. 4.hit glitch- i lowered the power of weapons but they still hit the same, magic shortbow his 35s with 0 bonus. 5.skull glitch- ive changed the skull but still remains as original. 6.login trade timer- I really need help adding a 60 minute trade timer because people can just drop trade to other accounts .
Thanks alot.

item.title: Many issues i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Bulletthrust Bulletthrust
item.description:
@Bulletthrust wrote:

Nothing is working, do you have skype, if you do please send a message to me which is bulletthrust. I need some help badly. as i add in the model ids and the text into the class 8 or class 5 for weapons. nothing works, i tryed typing in the ::addmodel whatever it said, and just trys to add a player to my friends list.

Read full topic
item.source: Many issues i need help with

item.title: Many issues i need help with
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

Bulletthrust:

Ok also, how can i find the models for mithril dragon or spirit beast, when i spawn the mith dragons its just a bunch of papers lol, last thing, i really need to know how to set a 60 minute trade timer. aka lamestarter

If you have the model, you can’t just add the int’s + model and just be done.
You need to do this after you added it.(Also to npc.cfg for stats)
Just plain out loud say this, “addmodel (model id number)”

Read full topic
